#BTC Price Analysis#

$BNB is showing strong momentum on the charts right now.

Price has pushed above the key $900 psychological level and is holding firmly around the $915 zone. On the 1H timeframe,  $BNB is trading above MA 7, MA 25, and MA 99, which clearly signals bullish structure. Volume is picking up with higher highs and higher lows, showing buyers are in control.

As long as  $BNB holds above the $900‚Äì$905 support area, the trend remains positive. A clean break and hold above $920 could open the door for a move toward the $940‚Äì$960 range. Any short-term pullback looks like a healthy retest rather than weakness.

This is one to keep on the watchlist. Bullish momentum is still intact.
#BNB #BTC Price Analysis# #CMC #Altcoin

s $BNB  being tested where structure really matters?  BNB is retesting a clearly defined range support, a zone that has repeatedly attracted buyers in the past. $BNB  is moving almost exactly like it did back in March 2025. Price tapped the 200 SMA, pushed slightly above it, then pulled back the same sequence that preceded the last continuation move.  Right now, it looks like a higher low could be forming around the $850‚Äì$860 zone, which lines up with the level we‚Äôve been watching. As long as this area holds, the structure stays intact and the path toward higher highs remains open.  This setup only breaks down if price loses the channel low the red trendline. $BNBWhat kind of nonsense is going on in BNB? In the 5-minute and 15-minute timeframes, it's taking support at the 9 EMA, creating a zigzag structure, and then continuously going up for hours. Then it goes down again, then up again; everything seems pre-planned. Everyone wants the market to go up, but not in this manner, through insider trading. This is the worst; even meme coins are better than this.

$BNBOne thing I can't understand is that even though there's hardly any volume in the market, how is this BNB constantly fluctuating between $17 and below $17?  Mostly it goes up. It never rises this much during weekdays, so where does it get this strength from on Saturdays and Sundays? What kind of planned pumping is going on?  Hats off to you guys!

üìä $BNB  Range Identified üìä  $BNB  is building clean structure with support around 880 and resistance near 1K üëÄ. Now that the range is clear, this becomes a trader‚Äôs market.   Watching closely for entry signals around 890‚Äì900 as price reacts. #CMC Quest: Earn Rewards#  #Macro Insights#  #Altcoin Season#  #BNBChain#  #BingX

#BNB  is currently trading around $912, approaching a key resistance zone near $927‚Äì$930, which has previously acted as a supply area. 

The recent push into this level shows improving bullish momentum, but price reaction here will be critical for short-term direction.

On the downside, strong support is visible around the $820‚Äì$840 range, where buyers previously stepped in aggressively. As long as  $BNB remains above this zone, the broader structure stays constructive despite near-term pullback risks.

If price fails to reclaim the $927 resistance, a corrective move toward the mid-$800s could follow to reset momentum. However, a clean breakout above resistance would open the door for continuation toward higher daily targets.

$BNB üî∏ Binance Coin update, the bulls control the market

#BinanceCoin #BNB #BNBUSDT

Binance Coin is a great gauge of market strength just like Bitcoin and Ethereum. If BNB is doing good, we can expect the rest of the market to be in a good position.

Bitcoin and Ether are both bullish but quiet, very quiet. Binance Coin is the same but the chart more easily reveals a bullish bias. Needless to say; BNB, BTC and ETH move together.

BNB's retrace lasted only 2 days, that's it. EMA34 has been confirmed as support and the action is shy green.

The highest volume bar came in 19-December after the higher low and this reveals a broader bullish bias. After this date, trading volume went down back to average. Not a single big red volume bar. The bulls have control of this chart and thus the market.

This chart is positive news showing that Binance Coin will continue growing, the same for Bitcoin and the Altcoins.

Namaste.
